item.tib: spros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud
rgyud thams cad kyi rtse rgyal nam mkha' 'bar ba'i rgyud
rgyud thams cad kyi spyi phud nyi zla bkod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud
nam mkha' 'brug sgrog thog babs klong 'dus spyi rgyal rgya mdud rgyud
lta ba la shan chen po rin chen sgron ma rtsa ba'i rgyud
rtsa rlung thig le'i rgyud
sangs rgyas thig le nyag gcig
srog gi 'khor lo'i rgyud pa
yang gsang lta ba la thal gyi rgyud/ kun tu bzang po'i srog gi spu gri/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi reg chod/ ro langs bde ba'i thugs kyi srog gi thigs pa/ brgyud pa gsum pa lta ba la thal gyi rgyud
spyod pa thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud/ srog gi thigs pa bdud rtsi'i bum pa/ snang byed kyi spu gri'i rgyud/ yang ti nag po'i rgyud/ rim pa nas snyan du brgyud pa/ spyod pa'i rgyud/
kun bzang srog gi thigs pa 'bras bu ye grol chen po'i rgyud
thig le mthong brtol gyi rgyud
rgyud kyi rtse rgyal nyi zla 'od 'bar mkha' klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal rgyud
rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud
rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud
rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge brgya pa thugs phrin las thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i rgyud/ lta ba thams cad kyi snying po rin po che rnam par bkod pa
rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor ba rtsad gcod kyi rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa chos sku skye med rig pa'i rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ klong yangs kyi rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos sku gcig tu 'dus par bka' bgros pa'i don rin po che yon tan kun 'byung gi rgyud

rdzogs pa chen po shin tu rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyud/ ye shes chos kyi sku/ don 'dus rig pa'i gsung/ gsang ba thugs kyi ting 'dzin/ rang 'byung bde ba'i 'khor lo/ mthar phyin 'bras bu'i rgyud/
rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i yang snying/ kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud/ rin po che gser gyi yang zhun
rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud/ lta sgom thams cad kyi snying po rin po che rnam par bkod pa
rdzogs pa chen po don 'dus rig pa'i gsung rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo
rdzogs pa chen po ma rig mun pa rab tu sel bar byed pa'i lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma
rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma
ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud
jam dpal 'dus pa'i rgyud
phags pa spyan ras gzigs ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud
snang srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud 'thigs 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud
rin po che bcud kyi yang snying thog ma'i dras thag gcod pa spros gcod rtsa ba'i rgyud
spros pa gcod pa sde lnga'i rgyud
rin po che bdud rtsi bcud 'thigs kyi rgyud
rin po che snang gsal spu gri 'bar bas 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud
rin po che spyi gnad skyon sel thig le kun gsal gyi rgyud
gter snying rin po che spungs pa'i rgyud
thig le ye shes bcud spungs sgron ma 'od 'bar ba'i rgyud
bdud rtsi bcud bsdus sgron ma rtsegs pa'i rgyud
snying po bcud spungs nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud
thugs kyi yang snying dgongs pa'i bcud 'dus pa/ ka dag rnams kyi gsang don bcud dril ba/ ma rig mun sel nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyud
sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i bcud bsdus ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud
dri med ka dag gi rgyud rin po che 'od gsal ba chen po
rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi rgya mtsho 'khyil ba'i rgyud
skye med ka dag zang ka'i rgyud
sku thams cad kyi snang ba ston pa dbang rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud
yi ge med pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rgyud/ rgyal po'i gdung rgyud/ lta ba nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud
rig pa rang shar chen po'i rgyud
rigs pa rang grol chen po/ thams cad grol ba'i rgyud
rin po che spungs pa'i yon tan chen po ston pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
dpal nam mkha' med pa sku gdung 'bar ba chen po'i rgyud
rin po che 'byung bar byed pa sgra thal 'gyur chen po'i rgyud
bkra shis mdzes ldan chen po'i rgyud/ dpal nam mkha' med pa
rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyud
kun bzang po thugs kyi me long gi rgyud zhes bya ba thams cad ston pa'i rgyud
ngo sprod rin po che spras pa'i zhing khams bstan pa'i rgyud
mu tig rin po che 'phreng ba'i rgyud
kun tu bzang po klong drug pa'i rgyud
gser gyi me tog mdzes pa rin po che/_sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud
nyi ma dang zla ba kha sbyor ba chen po gsang ba'i rgyud
seng ge rtsal rdzogs chen po'i rgyud
nor bu 'phra bkod rang gi don thams cad gsal bar byed pa'i rgyud
rgyud kyi khog snying sdeb pa
thig le kun gsal chen po'i rgyud
ye shes mar me'i rgyud
sangs rgyas ye shes sems pa'i dgongs pa tshigs gsum pa/_zhes bya ba'i rgyud
thig le kun 'dus chen po'i rgyud
sku'i rgyud padma 'khyil pa
rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa'i rgyud
ye shes bla ma chen po'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po thig le gsang ba de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyud
rdo rje srin po rno ba rdo rje mchu can gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ rgyud thams cad kyi snying po 'khor ba dong sprugs chen po'i rgyud
rin po che srid pa bar do rang snang ba'i rgyud
lha ma yin g.yul ngo bzlog pa'i rgyud
ro bsreg thal ba nag po thams cad rdzogs par 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
lha rgyud rin chen spungs pa
phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i 'phreng ba
jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa/ gsang sngags chen po'i rgyud
dur khrod phung po 'bar ba man ngag gi rgyud
rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud
rdo rje yang tog gi snying po'i rgyud
snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud
dam tshig bkod pa sa gzhi'i rgyud rin po che spungs pa'i rgyan
byung po kun 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud
lha rgyud rin po che dbang 'khor lo
rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i sku rin po che dbyig gi sgron ma shes rab chen po'i mdo
klong chen rab 'byams rgyal po'i rgyud
kun tu bzang po nam mkha' che rtsa ba bsdus pa'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po rig pa rang rtsal shar ba'i rgyud
rin po che gdams ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyud phyi ma
rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud
rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po
ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud
rin po che 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
ye shes gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems/ kun la 'jug pa rnam dag ston pa'i rgyud
mi nub rgyal mtshan rje btsan dam pa rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud
chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
kun byed rgyal po'i rgyud phyi ma
kun byed rgyal po'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma/
chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems su 'dus pa'i mdo
rnam par bgrang ba'i mdo dang 'grel pa
phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
bye brag 'byed pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
khyad par 'phags pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
gol sgrib ston pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
gtan la dbab pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
nges par ston pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
theg pa yas phubs theg pa dgu'i mdo
yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo dang don gyi 'grel pa lnga pa
bstan pa yongs su gtad pa
khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i yi ge med pa'i rgyud
khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyog ma med pa'i rgyud
khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud
spyod pa nyi zla dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi bka' 'grel
khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems rtsal chen gyi rgyud
byang chub kyi sems khyung chen gyi rgyud
rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i yi ge med pa'i rgyud
rdzogs chen bde 'byams
byang chub sems nam mkha'i rgyal po
byang chub sems rtse mo byung rgyal zhes bya ba bsam gtan
srog gi 'khor lo/
byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i myu gu
bde ba phra bkod
rgyud kyi rgyal po gser gyi rus sbal rdo rje thig pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
byang chub sems bsgom pa
byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po ye shes bdun gyi rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur ba gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud
byang chub sems kyi man ngag rin chen 'phreng ba
dpal kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po'i man ngag
bang mdzod 'phrul gyi me long
khor lo rdo rje
byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
rin po che 'khor lo rtsegs pa'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems nya mo bag la nyal
rin po che snang byed kyi rgyud
rma bya mjing bsnol gyi rgyud las/ 'bras bu bla na med pa'i theg pa
chos chen po rmad du byung ba
rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems rin chen bkod pa rnam par dbye ba'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba / byang chub sems rmad du byung ba'i le'u
byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i rgyud
bkra shis pa'i dpal rig pa'i khu byug
rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud
rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che gsang ba'i snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud
byang chub sems bsgom pa'i rgyud
rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa gsang sngags kyi lam mchog 'dus pa'i rgyud
byang chub sems sgom pa rdo la gser zhun
byang chub kyi sems thugs kyi rgyud rin po che spungs pa'i rgyan
sems lung chen mo'i mdo gsang ba spyi rgyud
rin po che rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud
sangs rgyas dgongs 'dus

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ gsang ba'i mdzod chen po mi zad pa'i gter gyi sgron ma/ brtul zhugs chen po bsgrub pa'i rgyud/ ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i rgyud ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
byang chub kyi sems lung rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud theg pa chen po'i mdo
lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud
dbang gi rgyal po dbang bskur rgyal po'i rgyud
rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud
phrin las thams cad kyi rgyal po skabs sbyor bdun pa'i rgyud
spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud
zhi ba lha rgyud chen po
chos nyid zhi ba'i lha rgyud
khro bo lha rgyud chen po
khro bo lha rgyud kyi rtog pa chen po
thugs rje chen po'i gtor ma sha khrag rus pa'i gtor rgyud chen po
rnal 'byor nang pa'i tshogs rgyud
dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rak+t dmar gyi rgyud
rin po che me lha zhi bar gyur ba 'bar ba'i rgyud
rdo rje dur mo'i tan tra zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po
sbyin sreg gi le'u
khro bo'i sbyin sreg las kyi le'u
drag po las kyi go rims
drag po las kyi le'u
rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal gdams kyi me rgyud
hum mdzad chen po'i rgyud
bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po'i mdo
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
gsang snying rgya dpe'i 'gyur byang
dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa gsang bdag dgongs rgyan
dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba spyi don gyi sgo nas gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i legs bshad gsang bdag zhal lung
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul brgyad pa'i rgyud
phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa
sgyu 'phrul bzhi bcu pa
sgyu 'phrul le lhag
rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ gsang ba snying po de kho na nyid bstan pa/ rol pa chen po'i rgyud/
sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i rgyud
lha mo sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo'i rgyud
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po
rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i khro bo chen po'i stobs kyi rnal 'byor dbang phyug sgrub pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i khro bo chen po stobs kyi rgyud rgyal
sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po
dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi ma
kyi rgyal po zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po
dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po
dpal mchog dang po
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las kyi 'phreng ba
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po
dpal snying rje rol pa'i rgyud/_'jig rten las 'das pa gsang ba'i mdo
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud rtsi rol pa
phur pa ki la ya bcu gnyis kyi rgyud ces bya ba'i mdo
glang po che rab 'bog gi rgyud
phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa padmo 'phreng gi don bsdus pa
dam tshig thams cad kyi nyams chag skong ba'i lung lnga/ bshags pa thams cad kyi rgyud dri ma med pa'i rgyal po/
rdo rje gzi ldan 'bar ba'i rgyud
bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ dad brtson dang ldan pa'i skyes bus rgyud 'chang ba'i thabs dang / rgyud kyi che ba bstan pa
bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa
bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo rnam par bkod pa
bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra
bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs
bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing
bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi drag sngags phrin las kyi rgyud spu gri reg chod/
bla ma gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod
yi dam gsang rgyud bka'i tha ram
mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa bu gcig pa'i rgyud
bde gshegs 'dus pa rtsa rgyud
bde gshegs 'dus pa phyi ma'i rgyud
bcom ldan 'das bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sngags rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma
bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i spyi rgyud las/_ma tshang ba kha skong ba'i rgyud
bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa
bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa'i lde mig lta bur bshad pa
de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba thams cad 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
bcom ldan 'das dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las 'dus pa phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
ma mo 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud
bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud
bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba ye shes kyi snying po thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing 'dus pa/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po/
dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud
dpal zla gsang nag po'i rtsa ba'i rgyud
jam dpal gshin rje gshed gsang rgyud
dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud
dpal zla gsang drag sngags nag po gshan pa spu gri'i rgyud
dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po'i rgyud
phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud
dpal gshin rje nag po me rlung skyin thang 'khrugs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po
phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed nag po chen po gsang ba'i rgyud
phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ pra khog bslang gi brtag pa/ phyi ma'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i lung/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi ma
jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las bsdus pa'i khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa phyi ma'i yang phyi ma
dpal tshe bdag nag po'i 'phrin las kyi dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud chen po
dpal gshin rje 'khrul 'khor nag po sdig pa snying 'dzings gsang ba'i rgyud
drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi rgyud
drag sngags mtshon cha nag po'i rgyud
dpal tshe bdag nag po'i rgyud/_drag sngags kyi de kho na srog dmar len gyi spu gri
phags pa 'jam dpal las bzhi'i 'khor lo'i gsang ba'i rgyud
phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/_rgyud phyi ma rim par bkod pa
phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gsang ba'i rgyud
gshin rje nag po gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi rgyud kha thun
gshin rje nag po kha thun gsang ba de kho na nyid phyi ma'i rgyud
dpal tshe bdag nag po drag sngags kyi mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud
drag po phung byed kyi rgyud
ngan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi ma
jig rten gsum gyi shes pa bsgral ba'i rgyud
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud
gshin rje nag po chu thig sngon mo'i rgyud
gnod sbyin gdong gsum pa'i rgyud
gshin rje nag po ngan sngags phyir bzlog pa'i rgyud
phags pa 'jam dpal mched bzhi'i sngags rgyud
jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma
jam dpal ma ru tse'i sngags rgyud las phyi ma'i phyi ma
gnod sbyin ma ru tse ro langs gsang ba'i rgyud
jam dpal gshin rje ma ru tse'i sngags rgyud bstan pa
dregs pa pho mo 'dus pa'i las kyi rgyud
rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs dang/ yon tan dang/ 'phrin las gsang bar bka' spros pa/ dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po
dpal padma dbang chen dregs pa bsrung bzlog yon tan gyi rgyud
dpal padma dbang chen padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dregs pa can gzan la 'bebs pa 'phrin las kyi rgyud pa'i rgyud
dpal padma dbang chen dregs pa gnas 'bebs kyi rgyud
dpal padma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud
dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud
dbang chen bsdus pa'i tantra

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa lung bstan pa/ rnal 'byor chen po'i gsang ba rnam par phye ba/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa/ dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par brjod pa/ rta mchog rol pa'i lung / rgyud thams cad kyi snying po/ dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i khro bo 'dus pa/ bde gshegs spyir dril rta mgrin rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud
dpal rta mgrin gyi las rgyud
dpal padma dbang chen dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud
padma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud
dpal rta mgrin gsang ba'i 'phrin las kyi rgyud
phyir bzlog pa stobs can rta mgrin gyi rgyud
klu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
dpal he ru ga'i gal po
dpal he ru ka'i thugs kyi rgyud gal po
dpal khrag 'thung gal po che
dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i rgyud
rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo punda ri ka'i tantra
de bzhin rigs kyi sgrub thabs gsang ba me dpung thugs kyi rgyud
thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i mchog bdud rtsi mchog gi lung bam po brgyad pa'i mchog
mi 'chi ba'i bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i lung

bdud rtsi chen po mchog lung gi nang nas/ sbyor ba'i man ngag dang/ sgrub pa chen po'i lung dang/ gzungs kyi mtshan nyid dang/ ga na'i lung bshad pa dang/ byang chub sems kyi yon tan dang/ a mr-i ta sgrub pa'i lung/ bam po gsum pa
bras bu chen po lnga gzung zhing bsgral ba
ma ha yo ga'i don gyi lung/ sgrub thabs bdud rtsi 'bum sde las/ bsdu ba'i bam po lnga pa
bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i mchog
bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung
bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung gi rgyal po chen po rtogs pa'i mchog las/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i nang nas/ 'bum ster bzhugs pa las/ lung gi bam po chen po brgyad pa'i don bsdus pa
thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin
bdud rtsi rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud
bdud rtsi chen po 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud
thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin rin po che 'phreng ba'i rgyud
bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud
thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin du 'khrungs shing skye bar byed pa'i 'bras bu rin po che'i 'od ltar bstan pa'i rgyud
bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho'i rgyud
thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i mchog
bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud
bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud
sangs rgyas kyi bdud rtsi ye shes 'od ldan rgyud
rdo rje khros pa phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa
rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rtsa ba rnal 'byor chen po yang dag pa'i rgyud
de bzhin gshegs pa chen po rdo rje phur pa'i rgyud
phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud
phur pa karma las kyi rgyud
rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud
phur pa yaksha za byed 'bar ba dam tshig gi rgyud
rdo rje phur bu chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po
sku dang ye shes thams cad 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas mdud pa
rgyud kyi rgyal po khro bo hum ka ra'i rgyud
rgyud kyi rgyal po khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud
khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud
khro bo gshin rje gshen po'i rgyud
khro bo mi g.yo mgon po'i rgyud
rgyud kyi rgyal po rta mgrin gyi rgyud
khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyud
rgyud kyi rgyal po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rgyud
khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud
khro bo chen po stobs po che'i rgyud
dpal rdo rje gzhon nu me long gsal ba'i spu gri reg chod 'khor lo rtsibs kyi rgyud
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal 'jig rten snang byed
rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'phreng ba
phur pa rdo rje bkod pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
rdo rje phur pa chos thams cad kyi gsang ba'i don dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
sbas pa zab mo mdung rtse'i rgyud
rdo rje phur pa mdung rtse dmar po'i rgyud
bse sgrom dmar po'i rgyud
sho na kar nag gi rgyud
rdo rje phur pa 'phrin las kyi 'khor lo gab pa gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
rdo rje 'bar ba gsang ba'i rgyud
rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud
rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po
phur pa gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud chen po
rdo rje phur pa zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud 'byung po kun 'dul
rdo rje phur pa gsang ba gdam ngag can gyi rgyud
phur pa bcu gnyis 'byung ba'i rgyud chung ngu bstan pa
rdo rje phur pa bcu gnyis kyi rgyud
yum gzung ma'i dngos grub chen po'i rgyud
srid pa rgyud lung gi rgyud phyi ma kha 'bar nag po las rgya mtsho'i rgyud
ma mo lam rgyud lung
sngags kyi srungs ma dpal e ka dza ti'i rgyud
ral gcig chos kyi dbyings bdag mo spu gri ya ma'i rgyud
e ka dza ti sbas pa nag mo'i rgyud
ma mo e ka dza ti za byed sbyang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud
mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud
phags pa he sdud 'bar ma'i rgyud
las kyi mkha' 'gro ma de kho na nyid gsum du 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud
srid pa'i mtsho bzhi'i rgyud
gsang ba gtan tshigs zhes bya ba ma mo 'dus pa'i tan tra
ma mo srid pa zla gsang thig les rgyud
ma mo byang chub kyi sems gsang ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud
ma mo byang chub kyi sems gsang ba'i rgyud
rgyud lung byang skor rtsa rgyud
byang bskor gyi rgyud phyi ma
phags pa lha mo rdo rje nag mo dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba sngags kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po
phags pa rdo rje nag mo dbang phyug ma'i rgyud phyi ma
phags pa rdo rje dbang phyug ma'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ tshig rkang yongs su gcod pa'i rgyud
phags pa lha mo nag mo'i sngags rgyud
phags pa lha mo nag mo'i rgyud phyi ma las kyi rim par bya ba
dpal lha mo nag mo'i thugs kyi srog bsgrub gsang ba'i rgyud
snying thig bkol ba'i rgyud
srog tig dang snying tig kyi rgyud
snying tig bkol ba'i rgyud 'ug pa'i gdong can
dbyings gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud
phra men sbyang ki las kyi rgyal po'i rgyud
rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las srid pa phra men rgya mtsho bsdus pa
dngos grub chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
dngos grub chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
dpal nag po chen po me lce 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
lha chen po tshogs kyi bdag po lha'i ded dpon zhes bya bar lha rnams kyis grangs
dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po
man ngag rtseg pa gri gug gi rgyud
dpal nag po chen po sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud
dpal mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
dpal nag po chen po drag po'i brtag pa dur khrod chen po'i rgyud
nag po chen po gzugs can gcer bu'i rgyud
rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ral gcig ma'i rgyud
srid pa'i bems
las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong can gyi rgyud
bdud bya rog mgo brtsigs gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rog ti'i mdo snying gzer nag po'i rgyud chen po
lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po
shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa
rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ta don 'dzin pa
khams gsum sgron ma
